name: Muslate
tag_list: music-cloud, free-music, online-music, playlist, my-music, cloud-music
overview:
Overview: Muslate.com is an internet based start-up which provides its users a platform where they can upload all of their music to Muslate Music Database and can organize it by using various options like creating playlists etc.. Users can access their music anytime, from anywhere by just logging in to their account on Muslate. Muslate provides all of these services without any subscription charges.

Uniqueness: Many sites do provide the option of listening music online, but they have a limitation that people with specific music interests or language preferences don’t get those tracks in their database. As Muslate lets users to upload any kind of music so people with specific music preferences can also become a part of Muslate and can have their music organized online.

Plan and Concept: Muslate is based on concept of mutual musicsharing. Users will be awarded with MuPoints for every music track they upload to Muslate Music Database, which can be redeemed later on for some Muslate goodies. However, once Muslate Music Database grows to a significant size then users will be able to use their MuPoints for buying music from other Muslate users.

Comments: Muslate is a self-funded start-up and is open towards any kind of capital investments from sources like venture capitalists etc.
